mapper.select: SELECT order_id, order_status, TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_at, order_detail_id, isbn, quantity, delivery_status, book_title, subtotal, coupon_id FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rank, a.* FROM ( SELECT o.order_id, o.order_status, o.created_at, d.order_detail_id, d.isbn, d.subtotal, d.coupon_id, d.quantity, d.delivery_status, b.book_title FROM orders o JOIN orders_detail d ON o.order_id = d.order_id JOIN book b ON d.isbn = b.isbn WHERE o.user_id = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC ) a ) where rank > #{start} and rank <= #{end}
select count(*) from orders_detail where user_id=#{user_id}
